00030 #ifndef LOGSTREAM_H
00031 #define LOGSTREAM_H
00032 
00033 #include <iostream>
00034 #include <string>
00035 #include "MsgHandler.h"
00036 #include "util/Util.h"
00037 
00041 class LogStream : public MsgHandler, public ProgressHandler {
00042 
00043 public:
00045   LogStream(int level, std::ostream *out=NULL) {
00046     m_Verbosity = level;
00047     m_Out = out;
00048   }
00049 
00057   void message(int level, const std::string &log, bool delimiter = true) {
00058     std::string timeStr = Util::getTimeStamp();
00059     if(level <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00060       if(!m_Out->good()) {
00061         Err::errAbort("LogStream::message() - problem writing to stream.");
00062       }
00063       if(log != "") 
00064         (*m_Out) << timeStr << " - ";
00065       (*m_Out) << log;
00066       if(delimiter)
00067         (*m_Out) << std::endl;
00068     }
00069     m_Out->flush();
00070   }
00071 
00078   void setBaseVerbosity(int level) { // do notthing
00079   }
00080 
00093   void progressBegin(int verbosity, const std::string &msg, int total) {
00094     m_Total = total;
00095     std::string timeStr = Util::getTimeStamp();
00096     // flush any C io before doing our IO
00097     fflush(NULL); 
00098     if(verbosity <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00099       (*m_Out) << timeStr << " - ";
00100       (*m_Out) << msg;
00101       m_Out->flush();
00102     }
00103   }
00104 
00113   void progressStep(int verbosity) {
00114     if(verbosity <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00115       m_Out->put('.');
00116       m_Out->flush();
00117     }
00118   }
00119 
00126   void progressEnd(int verbosity, const std::string &msg) {
00127     if(verbosity <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00128       (*m_Out) << msg << std::endl;
00129       m_Out->flush();
00130     }
00131   }
00132 
00133 
00134 private:
00135   std::ostream *m_Out;   
00136   int m_Verbosity;     
00137   int m_Total;         
00138 };
00139 
00140 #endif /* LOGSTREAM_H */
